scenes.label: *from_AC_02_07
texts: Momo's stomach was about to rumble.
Hahah... I guess I'm hungry. How about you?
So Loading a Save from before the newest one erases the newest one?
This meant that everything I'd done since my last Load‚Äîincluding the new Save‚Äîhad been undone.
No matter what I'd done or what the results were...
Simply by Loading, I could erase all traces of my actions, without anyone realizing.
I could do anything now. Even the worst crim‚Äî
Better quit that line of thinking right there.
I'd never do anything that went against my principles.
And if I ever came close to giving into that kinda temptation, I'd just have to ask myself if I was making a choice I could be proud of.
I had an idea of what I was capable of now.
All I had to do was find a way to get those three officers off our backs.
I took Momo straight to the workers' prefab from before.
There was no sign of the Cyber Force Dolls yet, of course.
I want you to change into this.
I took a uniform from a random locker and handed it to Momo. She started fidgeting for some reason, though.
Where was the changing room? Could she do it in the restrooms? They were outside, though.
Though, could you...look away for a moment?

scenes.label: *storehis
texts: You're the one with the key.
Uhh, well, yeah, but...did I lock it?
Acting on instinct, I pushed Momo into the nearest locker, then jumped in myself.
Momo's strained breaths were going right in my ear.
It was such a tiny space. Our bodies were squeezed so tight together that I could barely breathe!
Come to think of it...we didn't have to hide. I could have just changed course and gone with the bribery idea.
Shit. I really needed to cool off.
There it is. I swear, Sugimura always leaves it here.
By the way, did you hear about those Kabukicho maniacs getting in here?
They're a bunch of arsonists, so the place had to get a whole load of extra fire alarms at short notice.
Yeah, I know. But hey, the place is more fun than you'd expect.
I go after work, every now and then.
Seriously? I kinda wanna see for myself.
I'll show you how to get there. Let's go back.
By the time we got out of that tight locker, the workers were nowhere to be seen.
Momo was barely standing and it seemed like she might collapse any moment, so I went and supported her.
I needed some fresh air... I'm sorry...
No, I shouldn't have crammed you in there. Let's rest until‚Äî

scenes.label: *cfd
texts: Excuse us. We are police officers. There is something we would like to ask‚Äî
I quickly let go of Momo.
While we were scared senseless searching for them in the pitch black, they were doing this... Kids these days!
Whatever. You must be Pollon Takaoka. We're police officers.
Man, can't believe they caught me again...
Oh, I just, uh...think I saw you somewhere before... Yeah.
We're TMPD Cyber Security Division's Cyber Countermeasures Officers...
The Cyber Force Dolls, was it?
Wow! You're the fourth person we've met who knows our unit's name!
I think we should treat you to our introduction for that!
Huh? But we really don't mind.
My cringe tank was still full from the first time I'd heard it.
Oh...you don't look so good. Are you okay?
Did your boyfriend do something to you?
Whoa, whoa, where was this coming from?!
Things were taking a weird turn. My second try was gonna come to nothing at this rate.

scenes.label: *load
texts: It was time for a redo.
Coming to this prefab might've been a mistake.
The workers who'd come over said something interesting.
Something we could use to our advantage.

scenes.label: *select1
texts: I was thinking the same thing!
